vv64:14.2: nādo → nādī (s2, pts1) | nādi (s3, pts-a, mr)
vv64:24.2: hadayeritaṃ pītiṃ → hadayeritaṃ pati (bj, pts2) | hadayeritampi taṃ (s2, s3, pts1)
vv64:26.4: hadayeritaṃ pītiṃ → hadayeritaṃ pati (bj, pts2) | hadayeritampi taṃ (s2, s3, pts1)
vv64:27.3: Uposathaṃ kaṃ vā → uposathaṃ kiṃ va (s2, s3)
vv64:28.1: Nayīdamappassa katassa → nayidaṃ appassa katassa (bj, s2, s3, pts1-2) | sāsedaṃ appakatassa (mr)
vv64:37.1: Nayimasmiṃ loke parasmiṃ → imasmiṃ loke parasmiṃ (s2, s3) | nayimasmiṃ vā loke parasmiṃ (^kv4.3#63 [Sattarasamavagga/ Navattabbaṃbuddhassadinnaṃmahapphalantikathā]) | nayimasmi loke va parasmi (?)
